Guten Tag, Wir sind super interessiert an dieser schönen Immobilie. Wir planen, vorerst kurz- später langfristig in Spanien zu leben und können uns das in diesem tollen kleinen Haus in den Bergen sehr gut vorstellen. Da wir in Deutschland leben sind Besichtigungen für uns momentan leider schwierig, trotzdem würden wir gerne wissen, ob der Preis noch verhandelbar ist um weiter zu überlegen, ob es eine realistische Möglichkeit für uns wäre. Vielen Dank für ihre Mühe! Liebe Grüße Philipp H. und Lara T. Reply to Lara by email Thanks Kyero Agent Team ⓘNeed help? Read the FAQs or open a support ticket.

Translated: Hello, We are extremely interested in this beautiful property. We plan to live in Spain for the time being, and later for the long term, and can very well imagine doing so in this fantastic little house in the mountains. Since we live in Germany, viewings are unfortunately difficult for us at the moment, but we would still like to know if the price is still negotiable so that we can further consider whether it would be a realistic option for us. Thank you very much for your effort! Kind regards, Philipp H. and Lara T. Reply to Lara by email Thanks Kyero Agent Team ⓘNeed help? Read the FAQs or open a support ticket.

b. dias. Permítanme explicarles algo. Mi esposa ha sido jinete aficionada desde pequeña. Tiene dos Appaloosas. Durante varios años, estuvo gravemente enferma y ahora tiene la Gran Invalidez Española y se jubila anticipadamente. Debido a sus diagnósticos y síntomas, así como a los tratamientos que recibe en casa, solo podemos terminar de reformar nuestra casa si nos mudamos primero. Esto significa que nos vemos obligados a alquilar, lo cual no queremos, o a buscar vendedores que ofrezcan opciones de alquiler con opción a compra. Cuando mi esposa casi muere en 2022 y también se estaba recuperando de un derrame cerebral, le prometí que venderíamos y nos mudaríamos al campo, a una gran finca. Esta oferta sería justo lo que buscaba, pero el precio no es realista para nosotros. Por favor, pregunten a los propietarios si podrían imaginar nuestra propuesta máxima, que podríamos gestionar financieramente sin demasiado riesgo. Podemos demostrar ingresos regulares; somos alemanes, llevamos 20 años viviendo en España con NIE etc. Entrada 100.000 / 1.800 mensuales acumulables / Precio de compra 700.000 / Plazo hasta la venta de la propiedad o, como máximo, después de 36 meses. Gracias. Saludos. Marc Mehringer

Translated: b. days. Let me explain something. My wife has been an amateur rider since she was little. She has two Appaloosas. For several years, she was seriously ill and now has the Great Spanish Disability and is retiring early. Due to her diagnoses and symptoms, as well as the treatments she receives at home, we can only finish renovating our house if we move first. This means we are forced to rent, which we don't want, or look for sellers who offer rent-to-own options. When my wife almost died in 2022 and was also recovering from a stroke, I promised her we would sell and move to the countryside, to a large estate. This offer would be just what she was looking for, but the price is unrealistic for us. Please ask the owners if they could imagine our maximum offer, which we could manage financially without too much risk. We can prove regular income; we are German, have been living in Spain for 20 years with a NIE, etc. Down payment 100,000 / 1,800 monthly cumulative / Purchase price 700,000 / Term until the property is sold or, at the latest, after 36 months. Thank you. Best regards, Marc Mehringer

Dear Alma,
We asked Wendy about the normal process of paying the deposit.
Herewith her(abracasabra) answer:

Spanish sellers or residential foreigners there the 10% may be deposited into their account. If a seller is not resident it stays in the lawyer's account.
What you can do is to ask the buyer's lawyer to discuss this so that it stays on the lawyer's account We can still ask if they agree to deposit the advance on the 3rd account, or at least the other office. The question is whether they will agree. In itself, the division of the land has to be done first, and once that is done, we know that everything can continue neatly and there is no problem.

Can you ask if the sellers agree to pay the 18,000 EUR to the seller's lawyer?

We would like to make the purchase 1/3 on Nadine and 2/3 on Johan. This is in function of our children.

Some other questions.
- Is it allowed (with or without a permit) to install a terrace roof? What about any other outbuildings (carport, garden equipment storage)?
- Does the water basin hold any risks for us? Is the pumping system working correctly? Now we are only told about the value of the water.

Attached:
- ID cards
- client particulars

Kind Regards
Nadine Johan

From: Alma Fernández <alma@marbellasolicitors.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 4, 2025 5:56:49 PM
To: Johan Bergé <johan.berge01@gmail.com>
Cc: Wendy Loockx <wendy@abracasabra.es>
Subject: Purchase of Property in Álora – Payment Arrangements and Next Steps

Dear Nadine and Johan,



I hope this message finds you both well. It will be a pleasure to assist you with the purchase of your property in Álora.



Regarding the payments, please note that the €18,000 should be transferred either directly to the sellers’ real estate agency or to the sellers themselves. Holding the funds in our client account would not offer any security from the sellers’ perspective, and they may not accept this arrangement. However, as will be expressly stated in the arras (deposit) contract, if the vendors fail to regularize the registration of the constructions prior to completion, this amount will be refunded to you, as the transaction could not proceed due to a breach attributable to them.



With respect to the €1,000 you have already paid, I can certainly ask the other agent to transfer the amount to our client account, but the sellers must agree to this change and consent to withdraw the property from the market. Typically, this amount remains with the sellers’ agent, as has been the case so far. I will raise these proposed changes with the other agent and let you know whether the sellers are willing to accept them.



In the meantime, I kindly ask you to complete our client form so that we can open your file in our system.



Please do not hesitate to reach out if you have any questions.





Best regards,

Alma

Mijn naam is Maikel Velt en ik ben op zoek naar een mooi huis in Spanje voor mij en mijn gezin. We willen graag het merendeel van het jaar in Spanje wonen. In de ideale locatie kunnen we ook een b&b starten. Hier heb ik al diverse investeerders voor gevonden, zodat ik een mooi budget heb. Ik ben via een collega bij jullie terecht gekomen en heb jullie website doorgespit. Ik heb een mooie selectie met interessante opties gemaakt. Zo ook deze R4839949.Vragen over deze locatie zijn: wat is er mogelijk op het perceel? Kan ik bijbouwen? Met bijvoorbeeld stenen huizen. Maar ook mobil homes, tiny houses, chalets of glamping tenten zou een optie zijn. Ik wil vooral weten wat er mogelijk is. Ook zei ik dat ik met mijn gezin zou gaan verhuizen, dus zou ook graag weten wat de afstanden zijn naar dichtsbijzijnde school. En voor mezelf: de afstand naar dichtsbijzijnde padelbanen?

Translated: My name is Maikel Velt and I am looking for a nice house in Spain for me and my family. We would like to live in Spain most of the year. In the ideal location we can also start a b&b. I have already found several investors for this, so that I have a nice budget. I came to you through a colleague and have searched your website. I have made a nice selection with interesting options. Including this R4839949. Questions about this location are: what is possible on the plot? Can I build? With, for example, stone houses. But mobile homes, tiny houses, chalets or glamping tents would also be an option. I especially want to know what is possible. Good afternoon Shelley,

The house in Casabermeja is offered for sale including furniture. The price is negotiable.
It is very secluded, but it only takes 10 minutes by car to Casabermeja, where shops and facilities are located. You drive from the village of Casabermeja to Malaga within 20 minutes. The road to the house is mostly tarmac, however the last 500 metres are unpaved and more difficult to drive. The house has no DAFO which offers opportunities to do some small renovations. Note no additional building is allowed in the outlying area. The house has 3 bedrooms on the ground floor with 1 bathroom and another room under the house with an ensuite bathroom. By the pool is an outbuilding with a shower and toilet and storage space and on the other side of this outbuilding is the central heating installation.The house has its own water source. The central heating is on diesel.

The house is currently rented out and can be visited again after 24 March. I already have 3 viewings scheduled for 25 March.

You can also come with your clients then, at 15.30. Please let me know.

This villa is situated in the beautiful mountains near one of the 'pueblos mágicos' of Spain. The small village of Comares, 5km and 10 minutes by car, stands on a rock which overlooks the Periana Corridor and part of the Axarquia mountains to the north, while the immense Velez Valley and the Sierra de Tejeda are visible in the south.


The coast is 45 minutes away and Malaga (airport) in less than an hour. The photos on our website are all the photos we have.

The property itself is tucked away in fabulous nature, the views are fantastic and the road to it is reasonably passable as it is paved. However, the last 200 metres is unpaved and is moderately passable.

All the rooms have air conditioning, the villa is connected to mains water and electricity and has a water deposit of 10.000 liters.

There is also a rental license available so if you were to use the villa as a holiday home the rent could provide you with an income. A true gem carefully hidden in the mountains but yet close to town with all amenities!

ALLOW



Beste Fred,

Hartelijk dank voor uw aanvraag!

Dit huis is gelegen in Cútar, een prachtig wit dorpje op 20 minuten van Velez-Málaga en een half uur van de kust van Torre Del Mar. Bent u een beetje vertrouwd in deze regio van de Axarquía? Het huis zelf is volledig in orde en is voorzien van verschillende terrassen met prachtige uitzichten en met een prachtige tuin met fruitbomen. In Cútar is er een apotheek, supermarkt, bar en kiosk en het bekende museum waar een hele geschiedenis gepresenteerd wordt van het ontstaan van de Moorse invloeden in dit dorp. Er worden regelmatig activiteiten gepland en ik moet zeggen, de uitzichten hier zijn gewoon prachtig. Er wonen veel artistieke mensen buiten de locals die de 'Giri's' met open armen hier ontvangen! De woning wordt verkocht met meubels inbegrepen.

Kunt u mij vertellen welke aanvullende informatie wij u kunnen geven? Ik kan u enorm veel vertellen over de woning, maar het is het beste om telefonisch contact met mij op te nemen.


Wij houden ervan om zeer efficiënt te werken. Om u zo goed mogelijk te kunnen adviseren, kunt u ook het bijgevoegde wensenlijstje invullen. We kijken uit naar uw feedback en sturen u wat goede vibes uit ons fantastische Andalusië!

https://youtu.be/OYLnx04UBxM




U kan alvast heel nuttige tips beluisteren op volgende link: uitzending gemist 'Mijn Plek Onder De Zon' | FeelGood Radio Costa del Sol 106FM.
FeelGood Radio presenteert elke woensdagavond tussen 21.00 en 22.00 'Mijn Plek Onder De Zon' met Olivier Dykmans, de eigenaar van AbraCasaBra Real Estate. Olivier vertelt u wat er komt kijken bij het kopen of verkopen van een huis in Spanje, maar geeft u ook veel informatie over hoe u een locatie kiest, alles over zonnepanelen, watersystemen, de wetgeving, enz. Alvast heel interessant voor je!

Onze woningen verkopen altijd snel. Abonneer u zeker op ons youtube kanaal om er zeker van te zijn dat u altijd de eerste bent die onze nieuwe woningen ziet.

Alvast een fijne avond gewenst vanuit het prachtige Andalusië!
